Pre-Game Insights: CJ McCollum ranks 2nd among all NBA players in scoring average through the first four NBA nights of the 2025 calendar year with 36.0 ppg.
Jose Alvarado ranks 6th among all NBA players in assist-to-turnover ratio with a ratio of 3.71.
New Orleans has a turnover margin of plus-13 in their previous game, the best in the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans have won three straight meetings against the Wizards, including a 2-0 sweep last season.
New Orleans and Washington have four of the top nine rookies in minutes played.
